Posts.Content: rosemary_39 wrote: I felt the lump at the end of Jan. on left breast and was diagnosed with breast cancer. The lump was about 1.2cm. Now, I am waiting for MRI for right breast just to make sure nothing is wrong with right side. Recently, I felt the lump definitiely got bigger to about 3cm. I am very worried now but I need to wait for another week or so for the test and results. Has anyone exprienced the size of lump getting bigger? Does this signal anything? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Anyone felt the lump getting bigger? rosemary_39 lakegenevagirl

Posts.Content: rosemary_39 wrote: Hello, I had biopsy for left side one month ago and now I am waiting for MRI biopsy for right side. I read an article that it is much better to get the surgery within one month after biopsy. So, I am really worried becuase it wil take another 2 weeks to get the MRI biopsy result. Is there anyone who waited for surgery more than one month after biopsy? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: How long did you wait for surgery after biopsy? rosemary_39 lakegenevagirl

Posts.Content: rosemary_39 wrote: Hello, I was referred to Dr. Pinchuk by my family doctor. Has anyone received surgery from Dr. Pinchuk? Please share your experience. I really appreciate your comments. Log in to post a reply
